attributes.action: Give all retail workers Boxing Day and New Year’s Day off.
attributes.background:
Retail staff have worked so hard through this pandemic, with abuse chucked at them at every opportunity during these hard times. 
We want to give them an opportunity to spend more time with their families, and have an amazing Christmas after such a terrible year.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for individual employers.

You may wish to sign this similar petition calling for shops to be closed on bank holidays:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324610
